snippet.title: Truck World Australia - First look at Off-roading!
snippet.description:
Exciting news, truckers! We're back in full swing with our game development updates. 

This is a video of how we test the behavior of the truck in a mud and water puddles. But remember, we are still working on it! Let us know in comments do you like it! 

Remember to check out our refreshed Steam page and add Truck World: Australia to your wishlist to join us for more adventures on the roads of Australia! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1327040/Truck_World_Australia/

Also join our Discord for more frequent updates https://discord.gg/heWd4ayxGy
